layout.title: Women AdvaNCe
layout.description: Women AdvaNCe is a community of storytellers. We follow the needs of underserved populations and uplift the discussions that matter to the women in our state. Women in our state, especially disabled women, LGBTQ+ women, and BIPOC women, are too often silenced or discouraged from raising concerns about justice and equity
layout.creator: Jesus Chavez

hero.title: Building Brands, One Pixel at a Time
hero.subtitle: we're dedicated to shaping digital landscapes with awe-inspiring web design and development. Our mission is to bring your brand's story to life through visually captivating and functionally flawless websites.

about.heading: WHO WE ARE
about.title: Crafting Digital Experiences that Captivate and Convert
about.paragraph: We specialize in crafting captivating digital experiences that seamlessly blend creativity and technology. Our expert team is dedicated to designing visually stunning and user-centric websites that not only engage but also convert, ensuring your brand's success in the digital realm. Whether it's an e-commerce platform, corporate site, or interactive web app, we're committed to bringing your vision to life with captivating results.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.title: Happy Customer Feedback About Our Service

first.name: Julio Zaconet
first.paragraph: Queen City Web Solutions turned our vision into reality with an exceptional website that exceeded our expectations. Their team's creativity and technical prowess are evident in every detail of the design, making navigation intuitive and user engagement seamless. We couldn't be happier with the stunning aesthetics and functionality they brought to our online presence

second.name: Nicki Faircloth
second.paragraph: Working with Queen City Web Solutions was an absolute delight. They took our ideas and transformed them into a visually striking and highly functional website. The design perfectly captures the essence of our brand, and the user experience is top-notch. Their dedication to excellence truly shines through, and we're proud to showcase our new website to our clients and partners

third.name: Jesus Chavez
third.paragraph: Queen City Web Solutions is a game-changer! They crafted a website that not only reflects our company's ethos but also ensures our visitors stay engaged and convert. The attention to detail is remarkable, from the seamless responsiveness across devices to the innovative features that set us apart. The team's expertise and commitment to delivering a remarkable online experience are unparalleled. We're incredibly impressed with the final result

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.title: Unlocking the Potential of Women In NC
mission.paragraph: At Queen City Web Solutions, our mission is to empower businesses with innovative digital strategies that elevate their online presence. Through cutting-edge web design, tailored development, and strategic marketing, we strive to create captivating digital experiences that drive growth and success. Our commitment is to be the driving force behind our clients' digital evolution, helping them reign supreme in the dynamic realm of the web

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.title: Help Us Make Change
contact.paragraph: We encourage all of those who are part of our church family to give—not out of obligation but out of a spirit of worship. Your gifts allow God's work to be done in our midst, in our community, and in the world around us.

newsletter.heading: Ignite Success Together!
newsletter.title: Book Your Strategy Session with Us Today!
newsletter.sentence: Leverage the collective drive for success! Secure your strategy session with us today and let's ignite achievements hand in hand, tailored to your needs as a software developer in Charlotte, NC

about1.heading: Our Mission
about1.title: Crafting Digital Excellence in Charlotte, NC
about1.paragraph: We take pride in crafting digital excellence right here in the heart of Charlotte, NC. As your trusted partner for web solutions, we blend creativity and innovation to create captivating online experiences that drive business success. With a passion for precision and a commitment to client satisfaction, we're dedicated to helping you thrive in the dynamic world of digital technology

about2.heading: Our Story
about2.title: Nurturing Creativity Since Inception
about2.paragraph: Hola! I'm Mauricio, your tech guide hailing from Bolivia and a proud graduate of UNCC with a Cybersecurity degree. My journey has been a fusion of software sorcery and network wizardry. With years of experience, I've ventured into roles like a Software Developer and Network Engineer at Allstate, honing skills that range from Jenkins to Shell Scripting. My tech toolkit embraces everything from Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to JSON, and even Microsoft SQL Server

about3.heading: Our Expertise
about3.title: Specialized Solutions Tailored to Your Needs
about3.paragraph: our expertise is a blend of artistic mastery and technical finesse. We excel at transforming brands into digital marvels, crafting captivating websites that resonate with your audience. With a focus on tailoring solutions to your unique requirements, we combine innovation and precision to propel your brand to new heights in the digital realm.

team.heading: Meet Our Team
team.title: Unveiling the Minds Behind Your Success
team.sentence: Get acquainted with the brilliant minds driving Queen City Web Solutions forward. Our diverse and dedicated team of experts brings a symphony of skills, passion, and innovation to every project. With a shared commitment to excellence, we're here to transform your digital vision into reality and elevate your brand to new horizons.

section1.heading: Digital Transformation Solutions
section1.title: Empowering Your Business with Cutting-Edge Digital Transformation
section1.paragraph: Unlock the potential of your business in the digital age with our transformative solutions. From innovative software development to seamless process automation, we guide you through every step of your digital journey, enhancing efficiency, customer engagement, and overall competitiveness.

section2.heading: Creative Branding and Design
section2.title: Crafting Unique and Impactful Brand Identities
section2.paragraph: Elevate your brand's visual appeal and identity with our creative design services. From logo conceptualization to comprehensive brand guidelines, we create compelling designs that resonate with your target audience, leaving a lasting impression and fostering brand loyalty.

overview.title: Women AdvaNCe
overview.paragraph: Queen City Web Solutions is a dynamic web services provider based in Charlotte, North Carolina. Our dedicated team specializes in delivering top-tier web design and development solutions, seamlessly merging creativity and technology to craft engaging online experiences. With a strong focus on cybersecurity, we ensure that your digital journey is not only visually captivating but also fortified against potential threats
